attributes.action: Promote tolerance and humanity, opposing Islamophobia until IS is defeated.
attributes.background: We must show solidarity. Giving into intolerance is exactly what IS wants us to do. In response to this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107516 .

rejection.details:
Your petition seems to be asking everyone to take this action. That's not something that the UK Government and Parliament can make happen.

You may want to consider signing this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/112510
